Math and Pencil | Software Engineer | Anywhere/NYC | Full-time | https://www.mathandpencil.com

We are a small full-stack consulting agency with locations on the US East and West coast (Seattle, DC, Philly, NYC, Maryland, and Buffalo). I am looking for a talented full stack (but if you know python really well, that is enough) developer looking to work remotely full-time building applications using:

React/Redux/Jest/Websockets, Python(Django), Postgres/Redis, AWS/S3/Ubuntu, CircleCI/Jenkins

My client is a well-funded start-up changing the ways in which hurricane insurance is bought/sold/and priced. We are building extremely exciting real-time technologies and you will have a lot of leverage/ownership of the product/features you are building

If you are located in or near NYC a plus, but it shouldn't matter for the right candidate.

For more info: joseph dot misiti @ mathandpencil.com
